definition: to shift/to divert or distract (attention etc)/to change/to transform/metastasis (medicine)/to evacuate (people)
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
to move one's base (of operations)/to reposition/to relocate
transfer payment (payment from government or private sector for which no good or service is required in return)
to shift one's eyes/(fig.) to shift one's attention/to divert attention

sentences.english: The results indicated that interfacial charge transfer may be the rate limiting step.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明界面的電荷轉移是反應的速度控制步。

sentences.english: Transom mand cockpit components sorted and being moved to the boat.
sentences.chinese: 橫樑和駕駛艙部分排序和被轉移到小船。

sentences.english: He brought the subject to those who were agitating for a raise in their company.
sentences.chinese: 他把話題轉移到公司裏鬧着要加薪的那幫人身上。

sentences.english: In an information-based world, power diffusion may pose a bigger danger than power transition.
sentences.chinese: 在信息化世界，權力擴散比權力轉移更危險。

sentences.english: The research could lead to new therapies for preventing cancer metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究將會引發癌轉移的新療法。

sentences.english: There, robotic arms transfer the fuel into storage cassettes underwater.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，機器手臂將燃料轉移到水下的儲藏容器裏。

sentences.english: Similar shifts occurred in other crisis-hit countries.
sentences.chinese: 在其它受危機打擊的國家也出現了類似的轉移。

sentences.english: Eliminating problem by transferring the blame to others is often called scape-goating.
sentences.chinese: 消除問題靠轉移指責給別人常常被叫做替罪羊現象。

sentences.english: It was due to energy or charge transfer within the clusters.
sentences.chinese: 它起因於分子團內部的能量或電荷轉移。

sentences.english: Application of quadrupole mass-spectrometer in the transfer system for photocathode manufacturing(PC) is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了四極質譜儀在光陰極轉移系統中的應用。

sentences.english: The mechanism of corrosion inhibition has been explained from the point of view of electron transfer.
sentences.chinese: 從電子轉移的角度說明了含氮有機化合物的緩蝕機理。

sentences.english: The main cause of treatment failure was local recurrence and distant metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 局部復發和遠處轉移是治療失敗的主要原因。

sentences.english: You already know that my diversion is ironing.
sentences.chinese: 你已經知道了，我自己轉移注意力的方法就是熨衣服。

sentences.english: We report a case pre-senting as abdominal masses with unilateral pleural seeding.
sentences.chinese: 我們要報告一例以腹部腫瘤表現並單側肋膜轉移。

sentences.english: This forum conduct and actions divides into section the forum disallows to transfer.
sentences.chinese: 本論壇作爲分類論壇不允許轉移。

sentences.english: The nightclub has a landfill diversion rate of 89 percent.
sentences.chinese: 這家夜總會的垃圾填埋轉移率達到89%。

definition: to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to change direction/fig. to change one's stance
to get lost/to lose one's way
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
